property.description_en:
Great One Bedroom Unit on High Floor With Great Price Going For Rent At 70,000 AED 
Huge Layout with Great View 


Zabeel Park Dubai is a large, stunningly landscaped park located in Sheikh Zayed Road. It is divided into sections, interconnected via pedestrian bridges.

The park has a total area of 116 acres and comprises several parts, which are connected via pedestrian bridges, and features many attractions, including renowned The Dubai Frame. It is a viewing platform, from where one can observe the “new Dubai” from one side and the “old city” from the other.

In addition, the park has dozens of cafes and restaurants for every taste, a bicycle and jogging track, a boating lake, an amphitheater, a barbecue area, a mini-golf, a skate park. The park holds Dubai Garden Glow, a unique seasonal-themed attraction that comes to Zabeel Park every year, from October to April.

The main feature of Wasl Park Gate Residences in Dubai is its excellent location next to Zabeel Park and near Sheikh Zayed Road, which can be used to get to most of the leisure and entertainment destinations in the city.

From here it takes 10 minutes to drive to get to Downtown Dubai, 20 minutes to Palm Jumeirah Island, 25 minutes to The Walk at Jumeirah Beach Residence.
